abouthero.title: Hello! I am Chris
abouthero.description: As a Senior Product Designer, I love solving complex problems and creating user-friendly solutions. I'm always looking for ways to innovate and simplify digital experiences.

items.title: Smart metering software
items.description: I took on the responsibility of designing two web platforms and one mobile application.
points: MGM: A platform tailored to real estate companies utilizing an app for their portfolios. The platform aimed to automate reporting, leverage decarbonization potential, meet regulatory obligations and promote energy-saving initiatives.
Tenant Portal: An interactive tenant portal enabling users to monitor their consumption and identify potential areas for energy savings.
MIM: A mobile application designed for installers who have install devices in real estates.

items.title: Industries Paper management solutions
items.description: I was responsible for the design of six web applications (ERP, MES) integrated within the paper industry, each handling distinct aspects of the business. These applications cover logistics, production, measurement, packaging, HR, and ordering.

items.title: Taxonomy management software
items.description: I was responsible for the design of a web application for businesses that deal with large volumes of data.

items.title: Aquathon 2021
items.description: A portal for local activists to assess the advantages of implementing retention measures in the city.

items.title: HackYeah 2020
items.description: An agricultural farm portal that enables the calculation of afforestation benefits.

items.title: CodePlay 2019
items.description: An AI-powered application that utilizes Machine Learning to track users and notify them about nearby store discounts.

items.title: HackYeah 2018
items.description: A web application designed to compute the most efficient route for heavy transport.

description: As a designer, I am driven by a passion for innovation and a commitment to sharing my knowledge with others in the design community.
I have not only refined my design skills but have also won hackathons and spoken at conferences. I am constantly learning and growing as a designer.

skillset.title: Skillset
skillset.description: I am continually seeking new opportunities to learn, grow, and refine my craft, aiming to push the boundaries of my creative potential.

skills.title: User-centered Design
skills.description: UCD is my design philosophy, prioritizing user needs and behaviors. It guides me to create not just visually appealing but also highly functional and intuitive designs through in-depth user research.

skills.title: Prototyping and Wireframing
skills.description: Prototyping and wireframing are my creative playgrounds, where I transform ideas into tangible, interactive representations, allowing quick experimentation, iteration, and user validation.

skills.title: Presentation Skills
skills.description: I view presentations as storytelling opportunities to convey design concepts and decisions compellingly, making stakeholders as passionate about our designs as I am.

skills.title: Design Research
skills.description: Design research is my tool to understand user behavior and needs, helping me uncover pain points and opportunities through methods like interviews, surveys, and usability studies.

skills.title: Project Management
skills.description: I take a proactive role in project management, ensuring design initiatives align with broader goals, keep on track, and deliver on time and within scope.

skills.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
skills.description: In cross-functional teams, I act as a bridge, translating the design vision to resonate with product managers, developers, and marketers, fostering open communication and understanding.

skills.title: Strategic Thinking
skills.description: I bring a strategic perspective to design, aligning it with our business goals by translating objectives into actionable design strategies.

skills.title: Design System Knowledge
skills.description: I value design systems for their efficiency, scalability, and ability to ensure a coherent user experience. They are the blueprint for a harmonious design journey.
